videos.name: Scarborough Toyota - May Red Tag Days
videos.description: Motion graphics commercial made for YouTube pre-rolls promoting the May Red Tag Days at Scarborough Toyota.

videos.name: Law Society of Ontario Promo
videos.description: Ten second promo for the Law Society of Ontario. Special attention to delivery formats was required as this promo played on a range of platforms including television networks like Bell, movie theatres like Cineplex, and billboards.

videos.name: Startup Success Stories: Flixelâ€™s Pivot Moment
videos.description: One of a series of videos for MaRS Discovery District revolving around startup success stories. This video features Flixel and how they were able to pivot to move forward.

videos.name: Annual Ornge Charity Golf Tournament 2019 Highlight Video
videos.description: Highlight video of the Annual Ornge Charity Golf Tournament in 2019 featuring interviews from various individuals associated with Ornge and action shots of the day.

videos.name: Chubb Step-Ladder Safety Training Video (English)
videos.description: Training video created for Chubb regarding step-ladder safety utilizing demonstrations and voice overs. English and French versions were created for the client.

videos.name: REACH - The National Centre for Research on Education Access and Choice for New Orleans
videos.description: Overview video from a series of green screen talking heads promoting REACH - The National Center for Research on Education Access and Choice in New Orleans, USA.

videos.name: Gemsys RSS Websafe Training Video (English)
videos.description: Training video created for Gemsys Money Handling Systems regarding using their new RSS Websafe system. English and French versions were created for the client.

videos.name: Kognitive Marketing Onboarding Video Teaser
videos.description: Teaser onboarding video made for "pump-up" meeting at Kognitive Marketing.
